title: Which champ has the best laugh?
body:
We all love a good laugh-- some more than others (looking at you, Jinx). Whether you’re Singed kiting someone to their doom or Lux “[raising team morale](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BwrC3X7d0eI),” no game is complete without a hearty laugh-off. 

Which champ do you think has the best laugh? We also asked the Vine community for their best champion laughs, so check out some of our favorites and join in on the fun in the comments. 

(Pro-tip: you can mute and unmute the Vines by clicking the bottom right corner!)


1.  Taking a stroll with Darius
https://vine.co/v/e7prrnlQnln
**Vine by [scarfye](https://vine.co/v/e7prrnlQnln)**

2.  Nasus seems a lot smaller in person?
https://vine.co/v/e7Lpe3VhPb9
**Vine by [Woad Bro PH](https://vine.co/v/e7Lpe3VhPb9)**

3.  Raise your hand if you’ve been personally victimized by Nunubot
https://vine.co/v/e7DvrxqIVpH
**Vine by [Sailor Vee](https://vine.co/v/e7DvrxqIVpH)**

4.  Looks like Ziggs is having a... blast
https://vine.co/v/e7pj6hgBjDg
**Vine by [Joey Luthman](https://vine.co/v/e7pj6hgBjDg)**

5.  He laughs at your [vulnerable neck](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4GK_zO4s-1k)
https://vine.co/v/e7DhMlOBxKX
**Vine by [Blake of Legends](https://vine.co/v/e7DhMlOBxKX)**

6.  "I'm crazy! Got a doctor's note."
https://vine.co/v/e7TaiUwp3MT
**Vine by [Kuroshi Michi](https://vine.co/v/e7TaiUwp3MT)**

7.  Report Cass for negative attitude
https://vine.co/v/e72O1pA12uT
**Vine by [League Boy](https://vine.co/v/e72O1pA12uT)**

replies.body:
Easily Lux.
http://i57.tinypic.com/2iablzr.gif
I'll be having nightmares tonight, thanks. :(
That is a terrifying gif.
Illumination intensifies.
Oh god, no please.

{{champion:131}} Ha!
{{champion:122}} Ha!
{{champion:131}} Ha!
{{champion:122}} Ha!
{{champion:99}}
{{champion:27}} His laugh is core to his gameplay, cant get any better than that
It's an absolute travesty that I had to scroll down this far to find a mention of Singed.
{{champion:267}}
I have a major problem when I play Nami and just spam Ctrl+4 repeatedly instead of doing anything useful. :(

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Arie,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=ZEA8YOE5,comment-id=000b0000,timestamp=2015-05-12T19:43:14.000+0000)
>
> I have a major problem when I play Nami and just spam Ctrl+4 repeatedly instead of doing anything useful. :(

Solution:

1. bind G to laugh
2. spam g instead,
3. ...?
4. Profit

Now if only you could bind all the keys to laugh
XD
{{champion:30}}: Too late I already binded my keys with R
No joke, whenever I see the words "haha, yeah" (like in a text chat or something) I hear it in Nami's voice, and then it starts looping in my head, splashing sounds included. Best laugh spam NA.

If you want to be toxic: {{champion:99}}, {{champion:7}},  {{champion:150}}, {{champion:20}}Bot, {{champion:17}} 
Fun spammable laughs: {{champion:45}}, {{champion:9}}, {{champion:85}}, {{champion:267}}, {{champion:117}}, {{champion:127}}, {{champion:35}}, {{champion:67}}, {{champion:238}}
My favorite things is being Diana in game with a Darius and just spamming your quick, loud, "HA." "HA!" HA!"'s together in the jungle before the game starts up
{{champion:117}}
{{champion:99}} [Anyone who doesn't say Lux is automatically wrong.](http://www.finalesfunkeln.com){{champion:99}}
THAT SITE WAS SCARY BUT THE MUSIC IS THE BEST

I enjoyed this post. And the best laugh is clearly Hyena Warwick's
http://33.media.tumblr.com/ff3502d58973d13b0936ee0bd47cb238/tumblr_njhyyd5MGg1qz9wlpo1_500.gif
Can't go wrong with {{champion:150}}'s laugh, it's so adorable.
All these people are wrong; the correct answer is rammus {{champion:33}}: puts his arms on his belly and mimics laughs but makes no sound.
{{champion:7}} I think she has the most beautiful laugh in the world.
Zed has best{{champion:238}}  laugh

I guess I'm the only one.

{{champion:222}}
{{champion:27}} laugh only laugh

{{champion:99}} 

/thread
Evil anivia has the best laugh.
The most obnoxious to play against is probably {{champion:79}}, especially when he combines it with a recall in the Oktoberfest skin
i still believe {{champion:238}}  sounds like he has a metal bucket strapped onto his face when he laughs.
{{champion:107}} There is a taunting air to his laugh...
I LOVE YOU
Battlecaste Prime Cho'Gath's laugh is my favorite. Someone tries to all-in you and you have more than 1/2 hp left that laugh is just so funny to spam in their face.
Blood Lord Vlad has the best laugh. {{champion:8}}
{{champion:21}}'s laugh slays all of your faves.

{{champion:103}}{{champion:222}} {{champion:267}} {{champion:99}} {{champion:117}} 

I love a good laugh. I always make sure to press Ctrl+4 when playing them
I usually care more about the animations than the sounds, and then the best ones are definitely {{champion:201}} and {{champion:267}}, cause dat spam.
Diana hands down

blackfrost anivia's laugh (no.2 in particular) is the most awesome laugh in the game :D
I spam laugh when i'm in my passive and about to get back to life as the enemy team runs away realising the mistake they made

syndra's laugh is pretty stellar voice acting as well, with the deep breaths she takes at the end, you can feel the amount of magical pressure there is all around her :D

gangplank and mf's ult laughs are quite nice too

real trundle (traditionnal) is hilarious too
{{champion:76}} catform laugh, cat literally rofls also the catform taunt is great to because when spammed you can clam-slam your enemies.
{{champion:150}} hands down his laugh is the best... Gnar has the best everything though! Laugh, Joke, Dance, and of course his Taunts! TIBBAHZ!!! DEMAGLIO!! M'Ok.
My faves: {{champion:69}} {{champion:7}} {{champion:222}} {{champion:99}} {{champion:267}} {{champion:27}} {{champion:143}} {{champion:1}} {{champion:55}}
You can't beat a laugh-spamming Singed! Laugh while kiting, in lane, teamfights, dying (should be minimal with the laugh), while teleporting...heck, do it ALL DA TIMES!
Why no one say {{champion:69}}!!
I feel like Caitlyn has a great laugh. I think something went really amusing for me as it is like that she seems to act like she was forced.

Nami. Hands down.

"Haha, Yeah!"
Though I don't play her, I love Evelynn's. It's so creepy sounding!
{{champion:1}}   So evil it gives me chills.
